content:
ConsoleSpecialKey Enum

Definition

Specifies combinations of modifier and console keys that can interrupt the current process.

In this Article

public enum ConsoleSpecialKey
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
ConsoleSpecialKey

Remarks

The SpecialKey property returns the ConsoleSpecialKey enumeration type.

Simultaneously pressing certain key combinations signals the operating system to interrupt the currently running process. The two valid key combinations are System.ConsoleModifiers plus BREAK (CTRL+BREAK) and System.ConsoleModifiers plus System.ConsoleKey (CTRL+C).

Fields

ControlBreak

The stem.ConsoleModifiers.Control modifier key plus the BREAK console key.
ControlC

The stem.ConsoleModifiers.Control modifier key plus the stem.ConsoleKey.C console key.
